state_description: This screen is part of the CleanMyMac X application, specifically focused on cleaning system junk files. It shows the progress of cleaning system cache files and user cache files.

enables.name: Navigate to Smart Scan
enables.description: Switch to the Smart Scan feature for a comprehensive system checkup.

enables.name: Navigate to Mail Attachments
enables.description: Switch to the Mail Attachments cleaning module.

enables.name: Navigate to Trash Bins
enables.description: Switch to the Trash Bins cleaning module.

enables.name: Navigate to Malware Removal
enables.description: Switch to the Malware Removal module for security checks.

enables.name: Navigate to Privacy
enables.description: Switch to the Privacy module for privacy protection.

enables.name: Navigate to Optimization
enables.description: Switch to the Optimization module for performance enhancement.

enables.name: Navigate to Maintenance
enables.description: Switch to the Maintenance module for system upkeep.

enables.name: Navigate to Uninstaller
enables.description: Switch to the Uninstaller module to remove applications.

enables.name: Navigate to Updater
enables.description: Switch to the Updater module for updating applications.

enables.name: Navigate to Extensions
enables.description: Switch to the Extensions module for managing extensions.

enables.name: Navigate to Space Lens
enables.description: Switch to the Space Lens module for disk space analysis.

enables.name: Navigate to Large & Old Files
enables.description: Switch to the Large & Old Files module for identifying large files.

enables.name: Navigate to Shredder
enables.description: Switch to the Shredder module for securely deleting files.
